initial_question.title: [Game Window] issue when set to true
initial_question.body:
Hi Lyall.

I have an issue on my side whenever I set the Game Window to true.
Whenever I close the game it seems that a process keeps on running and I have to manually shut it down with task manager.
Even though the game is closed, music keeps on playing.

I don't know how much more I can provide here to help but anything I can do to help solve this issue feel free to ask back.

Edit: On a sidenote I noticed this because for some reason setting this to true allowed me to be able to enter the characters name at the start while it being false did not.
Also I am using specialK because of not having true borderless fullscreen (and wanted the game running the audio when tabbed out)

Thanks in advance and also thanks for the other amazing features coming from this fix.

satisfaction_conditions: Game process terminates completely upon closing
Audio playback stops when game is closed
No conflicts between window management tools

initial_question.title: Breaks alt+f4 handler entirely
initial_question.body: With `CatchAltF4 = true`, you can't alt+f4 (or end game via menu) at all with this mod

satisfaction_conditions: Alt+F4 key combination functions as expected
Configuration setting allows control over exit behavior
Exit behavior matches current game version expectations
